nodes.text: Tiffan Nye was a Human female who was part of a team working on the Republic Tarisian Archival Database during the Cold War between the Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. After her partner Wintag's research located the entire government of the planet Taris, alive and in carbonite, Wintag sent messengers to notify Nye in the city of Olaris.

Tiffan Nye first appeared in the mission "The Archive" on Taris in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2012. The game's dialog files indicate her name was originally "Tiffany Nightsky."
